title: 1.14.4的execute小问题
author: crfst99936484
txt_content: 检测到玩家身上有中毒效果，且呆在水里，只有一滴血的时候把他鲨了XD

replies.author: 天佑酱
replies.txt_content:
先加一个计分板
scoreboard objectives add SMFX040 health

再高频执行
execute as @a[scores={SMFX040=..1}] if data entity @s ActiveEffects[{Id:19b}] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:water run kill @s

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
execute as @a if data entity @s ActiveEffects[{Id:19b}] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:water run kill @s

你个坏东西XD

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content: /execute as @a[nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:19b}]}] at @s if block ~ ~ ~ water run kill @s
